publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7969 Patricia Ferguson: North Glasgow Housing Association Investing in Peopleâ€”That the Parliament notes the award to North Glasgow Housing Association of Silver level accreditation by Investors in People; acknowledges the praise given to the motivation and commitment of staff, the openness to new approaches and the commitment to helping tenants get the best from living in the area; congratulates the management committee, leadership team and staff of the association, and wishes them well as they strive for Gold accreditation.
